meanings.sent1: The backlit screen made the room glow softly.
meanings.sent2: The backlit keyboard was easy to use in the dark.
meanings.sent3: The backlit path through the forest looked like a magical trail.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was backlit by the setting sun, creating a beautiful silhouette.
meanings.sent5: The backlit city skyline at night was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.sent1: The backlit window cast a warm light into the room.
meanings.sent2: The backlit candles flickered gently in the evening breeze.
meanings.sent3: The backlit cat looked like a mysterious shadow creeping along the wall.
meanings.sent4: The backlit clouds in the sky glowed with a soft, ethereal light.
meanings.sent5: The backlit stage set the perfect mood for the performance.

meanings.sent1: The backlit painting on the wall added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The backlit sign outside the shop was visible from far away.
meanings.sent3: The backlit figure in the distance seemed like a ghostly presence.
meanings.sent4: The backlit leaves on the tree shimmered in the afternoon sun.
meanings.sent5: The backlit clock on the wall made it easy to tell the time at night.
